"岩石由来の希少種":
"Now I wish to investigate a rare variant
of a certain species residing in the
deepest parts of the forest; a variant of
the Rockbear, called Rogbelt.
I want to collect data on the rocks
that grow out of its tissue. As usual,
just defeat a few. I'm counting on you.

※Objetivos are Nv.41+ Rogbelts."
